mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zava_cart (cid, mid, pid, pcnt, ocode) VALUES (seq_cart.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{pid}, #{pcnt}, #{ocode})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM zava_cart WHERE cid=#{cid} AND mid=#{mid}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(sum(p.price*c.pcnt), 0) FROM zava_cart c, zava_product p WHERE c.pid=p.pid AND mid=#{mid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zava_cart WHERE mid=#{mid} AND ocode=#{ocode}
mapper.update: UPDATE zava_cart SET pcnt=#{pcnt} WHERE mid=#{mid} AND ocode=#{ocode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM zava_cart WHERE mid=#{mid} AND pid=#{pid}
SELECT filename FROM zava_p_attach WHERE pid=#{pid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zava_order(oid, pid, mid, amount, postcode, address, extraAddress, detailAddress, oname, ophone) VALUES (#{oid}, #{pid}, #{mid}, #{amount}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{extraAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{oname}, #{ophone})
INSERT INTO zava_order_detail(oDid, oid, pid, pcnt) SELECT zava_order_detail_seq.nextval, #{oid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid, pcnt FROM zava_cart
mapper.select: SELECT oid, mid, odate, ostatus, amount, postcode, address, extraAddress, detailAddress, oname, ophone FROM zava_order WHERE mid = #{mid}

SELECT o.oid, o.pid, o.mid, o.odate, o.ostatus, o.amount, o.postcode, o.address, o.extraAddress, o.detailAddress, o.oname, o.ophone, d.oDid, d.pcnt, p.pname, p.price FROM zava_order o INNER JOIN zava_order_detail d ON o.oid = d.oid INNER JOIN zava_product p ON d.pid = p.pid WHERE o.mid = #{mid} AND o.oid = #{oid}
SELECT ostock FROM zava_option WHERE ocode = #{ocode}
